tutorial.dashboardWelcomeMsg: Your personal dashboard for exploring the Quran through interactive puzzles.
tutorial.trackProgressMsg: Keep an eye on your streak, completed puzzles, and Juz explored here.
tutorial.dailyInspirationMsg: Get inspired with a new Quranic verse every day. Tap to hear the recitation!
tutorial.exploreQuranMsg: Choose any Juz to start solving puzzles and learning the Quran in a fun way.
tutorial.easyNavigationMsg: Use the bottom navigation to quickly access your dashboard, search, and profile.
tutorial.wordByWordAudioMsg: Click on any word to hear its pronunciation
tutorial.enableWordAudioMsg: When enabled, you can click individual words to hear their recitation
tutorial.audioApiInfo: This feature uses the Quran.com API to provide word-level audio recitation by Sheikh Alafasy.
tutorial.puzzleIntroMsg: Complete the verse by dragging words from the bank to the correct positions.
tutorial.wordBankMsg: All the words you need are here. Drag them to the answer area or tap to place them.
tutorial.answerAreaMsg: Drop words here in the correct order. Tap any word to hear its pronunciation.
tutorial.needHelpMsg: Stuck? Use the hint button to reveal the next word. You have 3 hints per puzzle.
tutorial.listenLearnMsg: Toggle transliteration to see pronunciation, or tap tafsir to understand the deeper meaning.
tutorial.understandAyahMsg: View tafsir (explanation) to understand the deeper meaning and context of the verse you're learning.
tutorial.yourStatsMsg: View your account details, join date, and learning progress here.
tutorial.chooseTranslationMsg: Select from multiple English translations to enhance your understanding.
tutorial.audioSettingsMsg: Enable word-by-word audio to hear the pronunciation of each word in puzzles.
tutorial.manageAccountMsg: Update your email, password, and other account settings in this section.
tutorial.subscriptionStatusMsg: View your current plan, trial status, and subscription details here.
tutorial.choosePlanMsg: Explore monthly, yearly, and lifetime plans to continue your learning journey.
tutorial.manageSubscriptionMsg: Update your payment method, cancel, or modify your subscription anytime.
tutorial.mushafIntroMsg: Read the Quran in traditional Mushaf format, page by page with beautiful Arabic script.
tutorial.navigatePagesMsg: Jump to any page or Juz quickly using the page selector.
tutorial.swipeNavigateMsg: Swipe left/right or use arrow keys to move between pages. Long press any ayah for options.
tutorial.ayahActionsMsg: Long press any ayah to see options: practice puzzle, play audio, view translation, or read tafsir explanation.
tutorial.learnTafsirMsg: Tap the tafsir button to read detailed explanations and context of any ayah from authentic sources.
tutorial.learnHarakatMsg: Need help with Arabic pronunciation marks? Tap the help button to see the harakat guide.
tutorial.yourTrophiesMsg: Track your achievements and unlock trophies as you progress in your Quran journey.
tutorial.yourStatsAchievementsMsg: See your total puzzles completed, best streak, and unlocked trophies at a glance.
tutorial.unlockedTrophiesMsg: View all the achievements you've earned. Each trophy celebrates your dedication!
tutorial.workInProgressMsg: Track your progress toward locked achievements. Keep learning to unlock them all!
tutorial.yourFavoritesMsg: All your liked ayahs are saved here. Build your personal collection of meaningful verses.
tutorial.browseCollectionMsg: Each ayah shows the surah name, ayah number, and Juz. Tap to read the full verse.
tutorial.quickActionsMsg: Visit the ayah in Mushaf view or remove it from your collection with a tap.
tutorial.verseBrowsingIntroMsg: Read the Arabic text with full vowelization. Like verses and listen to recitation.
tutorial.changeTranslationMsg: Switch between 18+ translations in different languages. Your selection is saved and applied across all verses.
tutorial.showTransliterationMsg: View the Arabic text in Latin script to help with pronunciation and reading.
tutorial.readTafsirMsg: View classical tafsir explanations. Works best with Arabic tafsirs and select translations (English: Sahih, Pickthall, Yusuf Ali; Russian: Kuliev).
tutorial.aiTafsirMsg: Get AI-powered explanations in English, Arabic, and Russian. Available for Pro subscribers only.
tutorial.viewTranslationMsg: Read the verse meaning in your selected translation language.

wordPuzzle.dropEachWord: Drop each word in the correct slot
wordPuzzle.dragOrTap: Drag or tap a word to place it
wordPuzzle.tipAlreadyShowing: Tip already showing! Dismiss or use it first.
wordPuzzle.tipActivated: ğŸ’¡ Tip activated! Watch the highlighted word and slot.
wordPuzzle.unableToFindWord: Unable to find the correct word. Try placing more words!
wordPuzzle.tooManyMistakes: Too many mistakes! Review the ayah again.

mushaf.swipeInstruction: Swipe left/right or use arrows to navigate â€¢ Long press ayah for options

dailyQuote.unableToLoad: Unable to load verse. Check your connection.

harakat.tapToSeeDetails: Tap any harakat in the text to see its details

onboarding.completeProfileDescription: Take a moment to personalize your experience
